keras.replace_code: def process_list_block(docstring, starting_point, section_end, leading_spaces, marker): import re ending_point = docstring.find('\n\n', starting_point) block = docstring[starting_point:(None if ending_point == -1 else ending_point)] # Place marker for later reinjection. docstring_slice = docstring[starting_point:section_end].replace(block, marker) docstring = (docstring[:starting_point] + docstring_slice + docstring[section_end:]) lines = block.split('\n') lines = [re.sub('^' + ' ' * leading_spaces, '', line) for line in lines] # Process list blocks for i in range(len(lines)): if lines[i].strip().startswith('-'): lines[i] = '- ' + re.sub(r'^ ([^\s\\\(]+):(.*)', r'\1:\2', lines[i][2:]) else: lines[i] = lines[i][4:] block = '\n'.join(lines) return docstring, block
